description.zh-cn: 唐朝公主，唐高宗与武则天的长女。其早夭事件是导致王皇后被废的关键导火索。
description.en: A princess of the Tang dynasty, the eldest daughter of Emperor Gaozong and Wu Zetian. Her early death was a key catalyst for the deposition of Empress Wang.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第三位皇帝，安定公主的父亲。
description.en: The third emperor of the Tang dynasty, father of Princess Anding.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上唯一的正统女皇帝，安定公主的母亲。在公主出生时为唐高宗的昭仪。
description.en: The only orthodox female sovereign in Chinese history, mother of Princess Anding. She was Emperor Gaozong's Zhaoyi when the princess was born.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，安定公主的同胞弟弟。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty, a full brother of Princess Anding.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，安定公主的同胞弟弟。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty, a full brother of Princess Anding.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝公主，安定公主的同胞妹妹。
description.en: A princess of the Tang dynasty, a full sister of Princess Anding.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗的原配皇后，在安定公主死后被诬陷并废黜。
description.en: The first empress consort of Emperor Gaozong, who was framed and deposed after the death of Princess Anding.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，是安定公主生活的时代背景。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that was the historical context for Princess Anding's life.

description.zh-cn: 安定公主的迁葬地。
description.en: The reburial site of Princess Anding.

description.zh-cn: 安定公主迁葬前的所在地。
description.en: The location where Princess Anding was buried before being moved to Chongjing Temple.

description.zh-cn: 安定公主是唐高宗的长女。
description.en: Princess Anding was the eldest daughter of Emperor Gaozong.

description.zh-cn: 安定公主是武则天的长女。
description.en: Princess Anding was the eldest daughter of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 安定公主是唐中宗的同胞姐姐。
description.en: Princess Anding was the full sister of Emperor Zhongzong.

description.zh-cn: 安定公主是唐睿宗的同胞姐姐。
description.en: Princess Anding was the full sister of Emperor Ruizong.

description.zh-cn: 安定公主是太平公主的姐姐。
description.en: Princess Anding was the elder sister of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗是武则天的丈夫。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong was the husband of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 王皇后是唐高宗的原配妻子。
description.en: Empress Wang was the first wife of Emperor Gaozong.

description.zh-cn: 因认为王皇后杀害了安定公主，唐高宗对其恨之入骨，并最终促成了废后事件。
description.en: Believing Empress Wang had killed Princess Anding, Emperor Gaozong developed a deep hatred for her, which ultimately led to her deposition.

description.zh-cn: 为争夺后位，武则天将女儿安定公主之死嫁祸于王皇后，是其政治斗争的对手。
description.en: To seize the position of empress, Wu Zetian framed Empress Wang for the death of her daughter, Princess Anding, making them political rivals.

description.zh-cn: 根据《新唐书》和《资治通鉴》的记载，武则天为嫁祸王皇后，亲手将刚出生的女儿（即后来的安定公主）闷死。
description.en: According to the 'New Book of Tang' and 'Zizhi Tongjian', Wu Zetian personally smothered her newborn daughter (later known as Princess Anding) to frame Empress Wang.

description.zh-cn: 于664年下诏追封其长女为安定公主，谥号思，并以亲王之礼迁葬。
description.en: In 664, he issued an edict to posthumously honor his eldest daughter as Princess Anding with the posthumous name 'Si', and had her reburied with the honors of a prince.
